name: lib/ActionField.js
ActionField
description:
Describes a field on an Action and how this field
should be sent to Siren API as part of that Action.

params.name: options.name:
params.description: ''     [description]

params.name: options.title:
params.description: null   [description]

params.name: options.type:
params.description: 'text' [description]

params.name: options.value:
params.description: null   Default value to be sent on the field

name: fromJson
description: Parses a JSON representation of a field.

params.name: json
params.description: The Object representation of the ActionField.

return.description: parsed structure which represents a field on an action.

name: empty
description: Default empty state for a field.

return.description: Default state

name: lib/Client.js
Client
description:
HTTP client used by the Super-Siren library.  Library utilized [superaget](https://github.com/visionmedia/superagent)
for all requests.

name: get
description: Creates a superagent HTTP get operation

params.name: href
params.description: The URL to perform an HTTP get against.

return.description: superagent get request

name: addParser
description: Registers a content type parser with all client instances.

params.name: contentType
params.description:
content-type which should be parsed with the provided function
                                whenever a response is received with this content type.

params.name: parseFunction
params.description:
Function to call in order to return response body when response
                                is encoded with the provided contentType.

name: globalHeaders
description:
Returns a Map of current global headers that are added
for all clients.

return.description: Immutable map of all currently registered headers

name: addHeader
description: Registers a global header to be used by all client instances.

params.name: header
params.description: The header attribute to set

params.name: value
params.description: The header value to set

name: removeHeader
description: Remves a previously registered global header.

params.name: header
params.description: The header attribute to remove

name: lib/LinkedSubEntity.js
LinkedSubEntity
description:
Represents an sub-entity of an entity which is represented
as a URL to the actual entity instance.

name: fromJson
description:
Parses the provided json instance and returns
the LinkedSubEntity representation of that json

params.name: json
params.description: Object representation of the linked sub-entity

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: Optional baseUrl to use if the href is a relative URL

return.description: Parsed representation of the linked sub-entity.

name: empty
description: Default empty instance of a LinkedSubEntity

return.description: Default empty state

name: lib/Siren.js

unknown.tagValue:
EmbeddedSubEntity
Entity which has been embedded within a parent Siren instance.

params.name: options.rels:
params.description:
new Immutable.Set() array of strings to identify how this
                             embedded entity is related to it's parent.

params.name: options.entity:
params.description: Siren.empty embedded entity instance

name: fromJson
description:
Parses the provided JSON representation of the Siren sub entity
into an instance of an EmbeddedSubEntity.

params.name: json
params.description: The JSON representation of a siren embedded sub entity

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: Optional base URL to use in case URLs are relative URLs

return.description: The representation of the parsed JSON

name: empty
description: Returns the default empty instance of an EmbeddedSubEntity.

return.description: default embedded sub entity

unknown.tagValue:
Siren
Immutable Siren entity.  This is the main entrypoint for all Siren operations.

name: findActionByName
description: Finds the @see {@link SirenAction} referenced by the provided rel.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the action to find.

return.description: SirenAction matching the requested name.  null if none is found.

name: findLinkByRel
description: Finds the first @See {@link SirenLink} referenced by the provided rel.

params.name: rel
params.description: The relation to this Siren entity for the requested link.

return.description: SirenLink matching the requested rel.  null if none is found.

name: findEntitiesByRel
description: Finds the @See {@link EmbeddedSubEntity}|{@link LinkedSubEntity} entities referenced by the provided rel.

params.name: rel
params.description: The relation to this Siren entity for the requested sub-entity.

return.description: List of sub-entities matching the requested rel.

name: embeddedEntities
description: Returns the sub-entities on this Siren object which are embedded sub-entities.

return.description: List of embedded sub-entities.

name: embeddedEntitiesByRel
description: Returns the sub-entities on this Siren object which are embedded sub-entities.

params.name: rel
params.description: Only entities with a relation to the parent siren matching this should be returned.

return.description: List of embedded sub-entities which match thes provided rel.

name: linkedEntities
description: Returns the sub-entities on the Siren object which are linked sub-entities.

return.description: List of linked sub-entities on this Siren object.

name: linkedEntitiesByRel
description: Returns the set of linked sub-entities on the Siren object which match the requested rel.

params.name: rel
params.description: Only entities with this relation to the parent siren should be returned.

return.description: List of linked sub-entities which match the provided rel.

name: selfLink
description: Returns the self link for this entity

return.description: link represented by the self rel, null if no self link is found.

name: fromJson
description:
Parses a JSON representation of a Siren entity
and returns the Siren representation.

params.name: obj
params.description: The JSON object to be parsed as Siren

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: Optional base URL to use for relative URL parsing

return.description: Parsed Siren entity

name: empty
description:
Returns an empty siren representation.  This Siren entity
contains no afforances.

return.description: Empty siren structure

name: get
description:
Returns a Superagent Promise instance which will perform an HTTP Get against
the provided href returning the response as a SuperAgent response.
If the response is Siren ('application/vnd.siren+json'),
then the body should be a Siren instance.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL to perform an HTTP get against

return.description: Superagent Promise Object

name: lib/SirenAction.js
SirenAction
description:
Representation of a Siren action, which allows a state within a Siren Hypermedia API
to transition to a new state.

params.name: options.name:
params.description: null                                [description]

params.name: options.title:
params.description: null                                [description]

params.name: options.method:
params.description: 'GET'                               [description]

params.name: options.href:
params.description: null                                [description]

params.name: options.type:
params.description: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' [description]

params.name: options.fields:
params.description: new Immutable.Map()          [description]

name: perform
description: Performs the action specified by this Action.

params.name: data
params.description: Query params sent as part of this action

return.description: Superagent Promise HTTP request to perform this action

name: fromJson
description:
Creates a SirenAction instance based on the provided
JSON object structure.

params.name: json
params.description: Object which matches the Siren JSON structure.

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: optional url to use as the base URL for all parsed URLs

return.description: Result of parsing the provided JSON object.

name: empty
description:
Default state for a SirenAction.  This has the defaults set and nothing
else.

return.description:
Siren Action which is created as a result of parsing
                            the provided JSON.

name: lib/SirenHelpers.js
follow
description: Follows the Siren model's link by the provided rel.

params.name: rel
params.description: how the requested link is related to the result siren we are following.

return.description: Promise which resolves to a superagent response

name: performAction
description: Performs the action identified by the provided actionName using the provided data.

params.name: name
params.description: The name that identifies the action to take

params.name: data
params.description: The data to send on the action

return.description: Promise which resolves to a superagent response

name: processUrl
description:
Processes the provided url and computes the absolute URL provided
the url and optional baseUrl.

params.name: url
params.description: The URL to process

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: Optional base URL to compute the absolute URL relative to.

return.description: Absolute URL

name: lib/SirenLink.js
SirenLink
description: Siren link used to describe navigation through a siren entity graph.

properties.name: rels
properties.description: set of all rels which describe this link.

properties.name: href
properties.description: URL - that this link refers to.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new SirenLink based on the provided rels and href values.

params.name: rels
params.description: array of rel values for this link

params.name: href
params.description: URL that this link refers to.

params.name: classes
params.description: Array of optional class names

return.description: Constructed SirenLink instance.

name: follow
description: Perhaps an HTTP Get against the href represented by this Link.

return.description: superagent request as a with a promise wrapper
